department: Public Servise over Natural Resources Canada
description: full evaluation of the Zero Emissions Vehicle Infrastructure Program
full_summary:
**Title**
Remotely Provide Evaluation Services for Zero Emission Vehicle Infrastructure Program
_____________________

**Reference**
cb-4896-55541877

**Publication Date**
2023-04-19

**Closing Date**
2023-05-04T14:00:00


**RFP Summary**
The Department of Natural Resources Canada invites suppliers to submit proposals for the provision of evaluation services for the Zero Emission Vehicle Infrastructure Program (ZEVIP). The evaluation services will support the program assessment and evaluation.

**Evaluation Criteria**
The selection is based on the highest technical merit, within a stipulated maximum budget. The evaluation criteria may be used to assess the supplier’s capability to deliver the required services.

**Trade Agreements**
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Security Requirements**
The level of security required for this procurement is classified as "Protected" (Canada) and "NATO Unclassified" (International)

**Solicitation Number**
NRCan- 500073153

**TSPS Contracting information**
Contracting Authority:  Roya Ayam
roya.ayam@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
Natural Resources Canada, 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E4, Canada
(343) 543-7809

**Background**
Natural Resources Canada requires evaluation services to support the assessment and evaluation of the ZEVIP. The proposed contract duration will be up to March 31, 2024.

**Key Tasks**
The scope of this contract includes:

1. Evaluation of ZEVIP program outcomes
2. Offer construction services

The professional services requested under this Request for Proposal (RFP) are for a short term contract duration to meet a specific need for your organization.

**Please submit proposals following the below general delivery instructions**

Contact SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA for further information or “Qualified SA Holder” status
